entry.title: Ready2Rescue ü§ï
entry.content:
Hii guys I am back. I am so happy to say that I attend another program that organize by Kelanasiswa UMT which is the Ready2Rescure program that aim to teach us about the basic first aid when some emergency happend.

This program let me learn so much about first aid, including the balutan on tangan, kepala, luka tercucuk and so on.

Not just like that, I also learn about the type of snake and know how to recorgnize which snake are venomous and which are not.

At the last session of this program, we learn about the way to do CPR for different patient including baby and adult.

Here are some picture during the program.

Let's go for Ready2Rescure 2.0 !!!

entry.title: Bengkel Laman Web~ üì¨
entry.content:
Experience

Today I attend a program name Bengkel Laman Web that organize by Kelanasiswa UMT.

The main application that can help us to create website without coding is...

In this workshop, we learn about how to use an application name Gridea to handle our own website that can hold all of our own post.

We learn about how to use github !

Beside that, we also learn how to user Github Page as our own personal server to create and manage our own post. It such as a very good experience to learn the way that how to get your first github account, manage the token and so on. üòçüòç

Website showcase XDDD

Here are some picture for my own website:

It look really pretty isn't it ? Stay tune for Bengkel Laman Web 2.0 !

entry.title: Hello guys
entry.content:
Today

Girdea

entry.title: Hello Everyone ü§ó
entry.content:
Thanks for joining Benkel Laman Web for today ü•≥ Hope you enjoy using Gridea to create, manage and post everythings your like to post in your future.

Time will fly, memory will gone, but text won't dissapear. üòâ
